Author: CriticalFlaw
Description: Custom HUD for Team Fortress 2, with the focus on minimalistic design and dark themed colors.

HUD Colors.Name: fh_color_target_damage
HUD Colors.Label: Damage Dealt
HUD Colors.ToolTip: Color of the damage amount dealt to another player.

HUD Colors.Name: fh_color_health_buff
HUD Colors.Label: Buffed Health
HUD Colors.ToolTip: Color of player's health, when buffed.

HUD Colors.Name: fh_color_health_low
HUD Colors.Label: Low Health
HUD Colors.ToolTip: Color of player's health when low.

HUD Colors.Name: fh_color_ammo_low
HUD Colors.Label: Low Ammo
HUD Colors.ToolTip: Color of player's ammo when low.

Crosshair.Name: fh_color_xhair_pulse
Crosshair.Label: Hitmarker
Crosshair.ToolTip: Color of crosshair when hitting another player.

Customizations.Name: fh_toggle_disguise_image
Customizations.Label: Show Disguise Image
Customizations.ToolTip: Toggle the spy silhouette seen when changing the disguise.

Customizations.Name: fh_toggle_lower_chat
Customizations.Label: Lower In-Game Chat
Customizations.ToolTip: Changes the in-game chat position to be near the bottom.

Customizations.Name: fh_toggle_player_model
Customizations.Label: Hide Player Model
Customizations.ToolTip: Hides the player character model seen on the bottom left of the screen.

Customizations.Name: fh_large_scoreboard
Customizations.Label: 32 Player Scoreboard
Customizations.ToolTip: Expand the scoreboard to show 32 players.

Customizations.Name: fh_speedometer
Customizations.Label: Display Speedometer
Customizations.ToolTip: Displays a speedometer under the crosshair

Customizations.Name: fh_big_item_meters
Customizations.Label: Bulky Item Meters
Customizations.ToolTip: Use the bulky style of item meters.

Customizations.Name: fh_centered_mvm_currency
Customizations.Label: Center MvM Currency
Customizations.ToolTip: Toggle Mann vs. Machine currency position.

Customizations.Name: fh_val_hud_style
Customizations.Label: Cornered Health/Ammo
Customizations.ToolTip: Position the player health and ammo in the corners of the screen.

Customizations.Name: fh_centered_vacc_icon
Customizations.Label: Center Vaccinator Icon
Customizations.ToolTip: Position Vaccinator icon towards the center.

Customizations.Name: fh_val_damage_values
Customizations.Label: Damage Numbers
Customizations.ToolTip: Change the style of damage numbers.

Customizations.Name: fh_centered_item_meters
Customizations.Label: Item Meters Pos.
Customizations.ToolTip: Change the position of the item meters.

Customizations.Name: fh_val_health_style
Customizations.Label: Health Style
Customizations.ToolTip: Change to different health styles options.

Customizations.Name: fh_val_killfeed_rows
Customizations.Label: Killfeed Rows
Customizations.ToolTip: Change the number of rows seen on the killfeed.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_code_fonts
Main Menu.Label: Code Pro Fonts
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle to the Code Pro fonts instead of TF2 Build.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_menu_image
Main Menu.Label: Show Character Images
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle the character images seen on the main menu.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_links
Main Menu.Label: Display Server Links
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle the server and social media buttons shown on the side.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_supporters_panel
Main Menu.Label: Hide Supporters Panel
Main Menu.ToolTip: Hides the supporters panels seen on the Stats screen.

Main Menu.Name: fh_hide_friends_list
Main Menu.Label: Hide Friends List
Main Menu.ToolTip: Hide the friends list seen on the main menu.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_background_stock
Main Menu.Label: Default Backgrounds
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle the default Team Fortress 2 backgrounds.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_old_mode_selection
Main Menu.Label: Old Mode Selection
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle the matchmaking mode selection to be shown on the side of the screen.

Main Menu.Name: fh_favorite_server
Main Menu.Label: Favorite Server
Main Menu.ToolTip: Set the path for the home server button.

Main Menu.Name: fh_val_loadout_style
Main Menu.Label: Loadout Style
Main Menu.ToolTip: Switch between different Loadout screen layouts.

Main Menu.Name: fh_custom_background
Main Menu.Label: Set Custom Background
Main Menu.ToolTip: Replace the main menu background with a custom image.

Main Menu.Name: fh_toggle_loading_bg
Main Menu.Label: Show on Map Load
Main Menu.ToolTip: Toggle displaying the background when loading into a map.
